H0.text: explorer who led an early voyage to the coast of newfoundland. John Cabot

H1.text: explorer who led an early voyage to the coast of newfoundland. Henry Hudson

H2.text: explorer who led an early voyage to the coast of newfoundland. Giovanni da Verrazzano

H3.text: explorer who led an early voyage to the coast of newfoundland. Jacques Cartier

A4.text: His 1497 voyage to the coast of North America under the commission of Henry VII, King of England is the earliest known European exploration of coastal North America since the Norse visits to Vinland in the eleventh century.

A5.text: William Weston of Bristol led an expedition to North America in 1499, making him the first Englishman to lead the exploration of North America.
